testcase.name: Staff can open invoice menu and see the fees of the test items and total cost and create invoice for the patient then should see the invoice that staff created

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given us23 staff goes to medunna url........................................passed And us23 staff signs in.....................................................passed And us23 staff clicks to My pages button....................................passed And us23 staff clicks to Search Patient button..............................passed When us23 staff enter user SSN in the SSN searchBox.........................passed And us23 staff clicks show appointments button..............................passed Then us23 staff verifies that there is a button as Payment/ Invocie Process for the completed tests.passed When us23 staff clicks on Payment/ Invocie Process button...................passed Then us23 staff verifies that exam fee and total fee and test item fees exist in this page.passed When us23 staff clicks on create invoice Button.............................passed And us23 staff clicks on create Button......................................pending And us23 staff enter user SSN in the SSN searchBox..........................skipped And us23 staff clicks show appointments button..............................skipped And us23 staff clicks on Payment/ Invocie Process button....................skipped Then us23 verify that staff can view the invoice............................skipped
